description:
The seventh annual gathering for independent web creators of all kinds, from graphic artists, to designers, UX engineers, coders, hackers, to share ideas, actively work on creating for their own personal websites, and build upon each others creations.

IMPORTANT: Please register for a ticket from https://2017.indieweb.org/ to attend! RSVPing on Facebook is not enough. Your registration will ensure that we get enough food for everyone!

Originally posted at https://aaronparecki.com/2017/06/24/1/indieweb-summit
name: IndieWeb Summit
